entries.title: Apple’s Massive MacBook Pro Failure
entries.description: It’s not a great time to be buying a MacBook Pro, with delays, questions of performance, and leaked technology all challenging consumers. What has happened to Tim Cook’s flagship laptop?

entries.title: Apple Loop: iPhone 15 Pro Leaks, Stunning Apple Watch Upgrade, Apple’s Budget AirPods
entries.description: This week’s Apple Loop includes the iPhone 15’s massive upgrade, the pricey iPhone 15 Pro, the cheaper AirPods Lite, Apple’s display ambitions, the mixed reality headset really is coming this year, Mac Pro disappointment, and more...

entries.title: Want To Buy An Electric Vehicle? Warning: It’s A Broken (Often) Charging Station Infrastructure Out There
entries.description: The more EVs hit the road, the worse the charging infrastructure reliability seems to get.

entries.title: Surface Pro 9 Review: Microsoft’s Evolution Of Versatility And Power
entries.description: Microsoft's Surface Pro 9 is the next 2-in-1 from the long-running premium brand, which brings a tight focus on Microsoft’s vision of modern computing. I’ve spent time with the Pro 9 to find out Redmond’s latest thinking in the tablet space.

entries.title: The Top 10 Movies To Watch On Martin Luther King Jr. Day
entries.description: Here are ten great films to watch on Martin Luther King Jr. Day that help us understand the Civil Rights Movement and racism in America.

entries.title: Record Roundup Volume 18: Top Turntable News Of 2022
entries.description: The top announcements and new product releases in the world of turntables from 2022.

entries.title: An MLK Day Reflection In The Aftermath Of Selma’s EF2 Tornado
entries.description: An EF2 tornado tore through Selma, Alabama this week. Here are some MLK Day reflections on race, weather, and vulnerability in the cradle of the Civil Rights movement

entries.title: Digital Technology Provides More Tools To Shatter Racial And Sexist Barriers To Management
entries.description: Technology — the game-changer for many things — can also help to finally help to open up opportunities for racial and ethnic minorities and women in leadership.

entries.title: First Confirmed ‘Night Shark’ In Puerto Rico Spotted
entries.description: A new location record for the night shark, Carcharhinus signatus, is reported for Puerto Rico. DNA barcoding was used to confirm the photo identification of a shark captured incidentally by a small-scale commercial fisher.

entries.title: Do You Need To Have Played ‘The Last Of Us’ To Watch The HBO Show?
entries.description: The Last of Us premieres tonight on HBO, and early reviews indicate it’s one of the strongest first seasons we’ve seen on the network, which is really saying something, given the caliber of its other offerings.

entries.title: 3 Ways To Tell If You Have Unrealistic Ideas About Love And Romance
entries.description: Having unrealistic expectations of your partner can lead to disappointment, frustration, and even the end of the relationship.

entries.title: A ‘Marvel Snap’ Negative Surfer Patriot Deck With A Million Win Conditions
entries.description: I am always on the hunt for new Marvel Snap decks, and this is one that really has captured my attention. It’s an amalgam of some of the best decks in the game. Patriot buffing, Surfer slamming, even Zabu is along for the ride.

entries.title: Inflation Reduction Act Favors Biologics Over Small Molecules: In The Long Term, This Could Partly Undermine Bill’s Effort To Contain Costs
entries.description: Because the Inflation Reduction Act gives small molecule drugs a shorter, 9-year post-approval window before their “fair prices” are implemented, executives in the pharmaceutical industry have argued that the IRA will “harm innovation,” in particular, with respect to small molecules.

entries.title: Almost Eight Weeks Later, ‘Wednesday’ Is Still Ascending The Netflix Top 10 List
entries.description: I’ve been watching the behavior of Wednesday on Netflix for nearly two months now, as the show was released on November 23, 2022, and here, nearly eight weeks later, is not still hovering inside the top 10 list, but it’s actually climbing through the top 5 again, currently sitting at #3.

entries.title: Ranking Destiny 2’s Most Powerful 3.0 Subclasses, Based On Community Voting
entries.description: There are the most powerful subclasses in Destiny 2 in the 3.0 era.

entries.title: HBO Max’s ‘Velma’ Is Getting Absolutely Savaged In Reviews And Online
entries.description: Velma always seemed like a bit of an odd experiment, a re-imagining of Scooby Doo in adult animation format where the danger is real and the jokes are more crass.

entries.title: Frontier Airlines Drops Human-To-Human Customer Service
entries.description: The airline is relying on digital support. If you check the website for ways to contact them outside of their self-service options on the site or mobile app, you can use chat, email or file a formal written complaint.

entries.title: Role Playing Via Generative AI ChatGPT Conjures Up Mental Health Questions, Stirring AI Ethics And AI Law Scrutiny
entries.description: Generative AI such as ChatGPT can undertake role-playing games with humans that use these AI apps. We ought to be considering both the upside and the downside impacts to human mental health. Here's the details.

entries.title: No Evidence Of Surface Microfossils On Mars, Says NASA Planetary Scientist
entries.description: The Martian subsurface should be the next priority in the exploration of Mars, says NASA planetary scientist. The goal is to drill at least two meters or more beneath its surface.

entries.title: ‘Missing’ Filmmaker Talks Twists And Turns In Wild Teen Tech Thriller From Sony Pictures | Interview
entries.description: The suspenseful sequel to the 2018 critically-acclaimed whodunit "Searching," ‘Missing’ centers on a teen who must use all the tech at her fingertips to find her mom who disappears on vacation 3,000 miles away. Stars HBO's Storm Reid. Interview with Sev Ohanian on making of the film.

entries.title: Today’s ‘Heardle’ Answer And Clues For Sunday, January 15
entries.description: Here's today's 'Heardle' song, along with some hints.

entries.title: Today’s ‘Quordle’ Answers And Clues For Sunday, January 15
entries.description: Some hints and the solution for today's 'Quordle' are just ahead.

entries.title: Today’s Wordle #575 Hints, Clues And Answer For Sunday, January 15th
entries.description: How to solve today's Wordle.

entries.title: No Evidence Of More Athletes Having Died Suddenly, Despite Covid-19 Vaccine Claims
entries.description: FOX News host Tucker Carlson has claimed on his show, “Since the vax campaign began, there have been more than 1,500 total cardiac arrests in those leagues and two-thirds of those were fatal.”

entries.title: ‘Blue Supermoon’ To An American ‘Ring Of Fire’ Eclipse: 7 Things You Need To Know About The Moon In 2023
entries.description: From two rare solar eclipses and a brace of lunar eclipses to a "Blue Moon" and four "supermoons," here's what you need to know about our natural satellite in 2023.

entries.title: CES 2023 Recap: Pressing Forward With Connectivity And Convenience
entries.description: This year’s CES is picking up where last year’s left off — with a continued focus on driving greater connectivity. A look at some of the big news in semiconductors, AI, automotive, metaverse, and More.
